turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I really need some coffee. Will you please order me some?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I really want some Starbucks please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and where are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In Fort Gratiot, there's one right on 24th Avenue

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. And what would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a grande coffee please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. Would you like anything special in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes will you please have them put some hazelnut flavor in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! And anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes will you get me 2 creams and 2 sugars please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely. Anything to eat?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I think just the coffee please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it. Would you like me to bring it to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please. I'll text you my address, but it's right down the road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, I'll be on my way to you with the coffee in just a few minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. Anything else I can help you with while I'm out.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's all, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok see you soon.
